page.title: 06TOURISM (Contd)/EVENTS
page.content:
Conducted tours are laid on for people departing from the Council Buildings and to happily fulfil this tour, visit Peter Potter's coffee shop which has the{oldest bowling green in {Scotland}behind it. There is also a recently opened wine bar called "The Waterside Bistro " beside the River Tyne.
{EVENTS} The{Haddington Festival}is an annual event which takes place at the end of May. The Festival is comprised of several events from accordian and fiddle rallies, parades, sports and games, fireworks to local art, historical and photographic exhibitions.{
